name: parse_pipeline_to_influx_format
parse_pipeline_to_influx_format
set_threshold_values

query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/schema"

from(bucket: "waterdistribution")
  |> range(start: -1h, stop: now()) // Replace with your desired time range
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "pH" or r._field == "Salinity" or r._field == "ORP" or r._field == "Flow" or r._field == "Temperature" or r._field == "Water_Depth" or r._field == "Turbidity")
  |> schema.fieldsAsCols()
  |> group(columns: ["device", "type", "zone", "tank"]) // Group by your tags
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 1) // Get the most recent row for each group
  |> group() // Combine all results into a single table

name: format_telegram
write_thresholds_db
